1 using System;
2 using UnityEditor;
3 using UnityEngine;
4 
5 namespace FullInspector.Samples.MinMaxSample {
6  [CustomPropertyEditor(typeof(MinMax<>))]
7  public class MinMaxEditor<TElement> : PropertyEditor<MinMax<TElement>> {
11  public static string FormatFloat(float num) {
12  var s = string.Format("{0:0.00}", num).TrimEnd('0');
13  if (s.EndsWith(".")) {
14  return s.TrimEnd('.');
15  }
16  return s;
17  }
18 
19  private static float ToFloat(TElement element) {
20  return (float)Convert.ChangeType(element, typeof(float));
21  }
22 
23  private static TElement FromFloat(float f) {
24  return (TElement)Convert.ChangeType(f, typeof(TElement));
25  }
26 
27  public override MinMax<TElement> Edit(Rect region, GUIContent label, MinMax<TElement> element) {
28  float min = ToFloat(element.Min);
29  float max = ToFloat(element.Max);
30  float minLimit = ToFloat(element.MinLimit);
31  float maxLimit = ToFloat(element.MaxLimit);
32 
33  string labelText = label.text + string.Format(" ({0}/{2} - {1}/{3})",
34  FormatFloat(min), FormatFloat(max),
35  FormatFloat(minLimit), FormatFloat(maxLimit));
36  var updatedLabel = new GUIContent(labelText, label.image, label.tooltip);
37 
38  EditorGUI.MinMaxSlider(updatedLabel, region, ref min, ref max, minLimit, maxLimit);
39 
40  return new MinMax<TElement>() {
41  Min = FromFloat(min),
42  Max = FromFloat(max),
43  MinLimit = FromFloat(minLimit),
44  MaxLimit = FromFloat(maxLimit)
45  };
46  }
47 
48  public override float GetElementHeight(GUIContent label, MinMax<TElement> element) {
49  return EditorStyles.largeLabel.CalcHeight(label, 100);
50  }
51  }
52 }
FullInspector.Samples.MinMaxSample.MinMaxEditor< TElement >.FormatFloat
static string FormatFloat(float num)
Formats a float so that it shows up to two decimal places if they are non-zero.
